mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM csmall_ups.ups_cart JOIN csmall_ups.ups_user ON ups_user.id = ups_cart.user_id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_spu ON ups_cart.spu_id = ups_spu.id WHERE ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_user.id = #{userId};

SELECT ups_spu.id FROM csmall_ups.ups_cart JOIN csmall_ups.ups_user ON ups_user.id = ups_cart.user_id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_spu ON ups_cart.spu_id = ups_spu.id WHERE ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_user.id = #{userId};

SELECT ups_attribute.value_list, ups_attribute.unit FROM csmall_ups.ups_cart JOIN csmall_ups.ups_user ON ups_user.id = ups_cart.user_id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_spu ON ups_cart.spu_id = ups_spu.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_attribute ON ups_spu.attribute_template_id = ups_attribute.template_id WHERE ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_spu.id = #{spuId};

SELECT ups_user.id uid, ups_spu.id sid, ups_spu.title, ups_spu.index_price, ups_spu.brand_name, ups_spu.category_name, ups_spu.tags, ups_spu.detail, ups_picture.url FROM csmall_ups.ups_cart JOIN csmall_ups.ups_user ON ups_user.id = ups_cart.user_id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_spu ON ups_cart.spu_id = ups_spu.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_picture.album_id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_user.id = #{userId};
